db:abstract.db:para: The base class for effects in a Qt 3D scene.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Effect type combines a set of techniques and parameters used by those techniques to produce a rendering effect for a material.
An Effect instance should be shared among several Material instances when possible.
A Parameter defined on a Effect overrides parameter (of the same name) defined in Technique and RenderPass, but are overridden by parameter in RenderPassFilter, TechniqueFilter and Material.

db:note.db:para: Effect node can not be disabled.

db:section.db:title: parameters : list<Parameter>
db:section.db:para: Holds the list of parameters used by this effect. A parameter is used to set a corresponding uniform value in the shader used by this effect.

db:section.db:title: techniques : list<Technique>
db:section.db:para: Holds the list of techniques used by this effect.
